actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide separate subheadings for flexible magnets and composite goods containing flexible magnets and to create additional U.S. notes explaining the tariff classification of flexible magnets and composite goods containing flexible magnets.

summary.text: Amends the United States Harmonized Tariff Structure to provide separate subheadings for flexible magnets and composite goods containing flexible magnets.

titles.title: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide separate subheadings for flexible magnets and composite goods containing flexible magnets and to create additional U.S. notes explaining the tariff classification of flexible magnets and composite goods containing flexible magnets.
